entity.description: US Governor of New Jersey Phil Murphy

text:
@GovMurphy As long as we have a segment of the population unwilling to #WearADamnMask and abide by #SocialDistancing Covid19 will continue to be a problem. 
Without a national plan NJ will continue to see #’s go up and down.
